item.description: It's time to hit King's for dinner, bowling, and Open Mic Night. Due to some holiday parties, we'll have to wait until 8:30 to bowl, so let's meet at 7 for dinner in the restaurant area. I plan to arrive early (~6:30) to put our name on the bowling waitlist. It will help to have as many people as possible there early. If we order entrees in the restaurant, we'll get preference when a lane opens. For your information, shoe rental costs $4 and games are $5.50 each (so $15 total if we bowl two games). Open mic starts at 9 in the restaurant. Once we finish bowling, let's grab a drink and watch the talent -- musicians, comics, poets, you name it. If you're feeling bold, sign up starts at 7:30. I'm going to read a couple of poems. We can be our own cheering section!

group.name: Brunch & More (20/30-Somethings for brunch & more, etc...)

item.name: Dinner, Bowling, and Open Mic Night at King's
